text: Portrait of Ambroise Vollard with a Cat by Pierre Bonnard Portrait of Ambroise Vollard with a Cat is a painting by Pierre Bonnard, executed c. 1924. It is housed now in the Petit Palais in Paris.. Bonnard often painted its subject, the art dealer Ambroise Vollard. ==References== category:Paintings of the Petit Palais category:1924 paintings category:Paintings by Pierre Bonnard category:Portraits of men category:20th-century portraits Category:Cats in art
title: Portrait of Ambroise Vollard with a Cat
